posts.post_title: NEW Lot of 20 Lower Grade T206's w/HOF'ers *PRICE DROP*
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T206 cards available. As you can see by the scans, these are all lower grade cards and are priced accordingly. 

Please add $2.00 shipping for 1-2 cards. Three or more ship for free. Payment via any method you prefer. Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to reserve cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!
